label: Vision & Mission
heading: Vision & Mission of the Department
description: To be a centre of excellence in the field of civil engineering and to create the new technology for future requirements with the necessary knowledge, skills and attitudes of civil engineering that can be entrusted by the society to lead a sustainable world with enhanced quality of life.

sections.heading: Mission of the Department
items: To prepare effective and responsible graduate engineers for global requirements by providing quality education
To constantly strive to improve pedagogical methods employed in delivering the academic programs
To conduct basic and applied research to enhance intellectual property
To provide consultancy to the neighborhood and cultivate the spirit of entrepreneurship
To encourage students to pursue higher education and take competitive exams and various career enhancing courses
